nodes.name: setup

nodes.documentation:
@notice Increases reputation of a validator by delta.
     * @dev Function requires
         - only consensus can call
         - the specified validator is active
     * @param _validator A validator for which to increase reputation.
@param _delta A change (delta) to increase a validator's reputation.
     * @return Returns an updated reputation.
nodes.name: increaseReputation

nodes.documentation:
@notice Decreases reputation of a validator by delta.
        Sets the validator's reputation to 0 if after operation
        it's negative.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - only consensus can call
         - the specified validator is active
     * @param _validator A validator for which to decrease a reputation.
@param _delta A change (delta) to decrease a validator's reputation.
     * @return Returns an updated reputation.
nodes.name: decreaseReputation

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Failed to transfer earnings to the contract address."

arguments.value: Failed to transfer earnings to the contract address.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Failed to transfer earnings to the contract address."

nodes.documentation:
@notice Deposits earnings of a validator by the specified amount.
        Only fixed per-mille (`cashableEarningsPerMille`) from the
        earned amount is cashable by a validator immediately.
        The remaining is locked in the contract and can be cashed out
        only when the validator has deregistered and cooling period
        has elapsed.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - a validator is active
         - a caller has approved the contract to transfer
           `_amount` MOST from its address to the contract address.
     * @param _validator A validator to deposit earnings.
@param _amount An amount of earnings of a validator.
nodes.name: depositEarnings

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The specified amount is bigger than available cashable amount."

arguments.value: The specified amount is bigger than available cashable amount.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The specified amount is bigger than available cashable amount."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Failed to transfer cashable earnings to withdrawal address."

arguments.value: Failed to transfer cashable earnings to withdrawal address.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Failed to transfer cashable earnings to withdrawal address."

nodes.documentation:
@notice Cash out the specified amount from cashable earnings
        of a validator.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - only validator can call
         - validator has staked
         - validator was not slashed
         - validator has not withdrawn
         - the specified amount is not bigger than cashable earnings
           of a validator
     * @param _amount An amount to withdraw.
nodes.name: cashOutEarnings

arguments.value: Validator address is 0.
Validator's withdrawal address is 0.

arguments.value: Validator's address is the same as its withdrawal address.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Validator's address is the same as its withdrawal address."

arguments.value: No validator can stake again.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The specified withdrawal address was registered as validator."

arguments.value: The specified withdrawal address was registered as validator.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The specified withdrawal address was registered as validator."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Failed to transfer MOST stake amount from a validator."

arguments.value: Failed to transfer wETH stake amount from a validator.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Failed to transfer wETH stake amount from a validator."

nodes.documentation:
@notice Stakes a validator.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - only consensus can call
         - a validator address is not 0
         - a withdrawal address is not 0
         - a validator address is not same as its withdrawal address
         - a validator has not staked previously
         - a withdrawal address has not been used as a validator address
         - a validator approved in MOST token contract to transfer
           a stake amount.
         - a validator approved in wETH token contract to transfer
           a stake amount.
     * @param _validator A validator address to stake.
@param _withdrawalAddress A withdrawal address of newly staked validator.
     * @return reputation_ Initial reputation of a validator.
nodes.name: stake

nodes.documentation:
@notice Deregisters a validator.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - only consensus can call
         - validator is active
     * @param _validator A validator to deregister.
nodes.name: deregister

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Failed to withdraw staked wETH amount."

nodes.documentation:
@notice Withdraws staked and earnings values to a validator.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - a validator has deregistered
         - a validator was not slashed
         - a validator has not withdrawn
         - a withdrawal cooling period for the validator has elapsed
     * @param _validator A validator to withdraw earnings and stakes.
nodes.name: withdraw

cashOutEarnings(uint256).details: Function requires:         - only validator can call         - validator has staked         - validator was not slashed         - validator has not withdrawn         - the specified amount is not bigger than cashable earnings           of a validator

decreaseReputation(address,uint256).details: Function requires:         - only consensus can call         - the specified validator is active

params._delta: A change (delta) to decrease a validator's reputation.
params._validator: A validator for which to decrease a reputation.

depositEarnings(address,uint256).details: Function requires:         - a validator is active         - a caller has approved the contract to transfer           `_amount` MOST from its address to the contract address.

params._amount: An amount of earnings of a validator.

deregister(address).details: Function requires:         - only consensus can call         - validator is active

params._validator: An address of a validator. Returns validator reputation.

increaseReputation(address,uint256).details: Function requires         - only consensus can call         - the specified validator is active

params._delta: A change (delta) to increase a validator's reputation.
params._validator: A validator for which to increase reputation.
An address of a validator. Returns true if the specified address is slashed.

setup(address,address,uint256,address,ui.details: Function requires:         - MOST token address is not 0         - wETH token address is not 0         - a stake amount to stake in MOST is positive         - a stake amount to stake in wETH is positive         - a cashable earnings per mille is in [0, 1000] range

params._cashableEarningsPerMille: Number ranging from [0-1000] which                                 defines cashable earning per mille.
params._initialReputation: Initial reputation assigned when a validator                          stakes.
params._stakeMOSTAmount: Amount of MOST token in wei required to be                        staked by each validator on staking.
params._stakeWETHAmount: Amount of wETH token in wei required to be                        staked by each validator on staking.
params._withdrawalCooldownPeriodInBlocks: Defines block delay between                                         deregister and withdraw operation                                         for a validator.

stake(address,address).details: Function requires:         - only consensus can call         - a validator address is not 0         - a withdrawal address is not 0         - a validator address is not same as its withdrawal address         - a validator has not staked previously         - a withdrawal address has not been used as a validator address         - a validator approved in MOST token contract to transfer           a stake amount.         - a validator approved in wETH token contract to transfer           a stake amount.

params._withdrawalAddress: A withdrawal address of newly staked validator.

stake(address,address).return: reputation_ Initial reputation of a validator.

withdraw(address).details: Function requires:         - a validator has deregistered         - a validator was not slashed         - a validator has not withdrawn         - a withdrawal cooling period for the validator has elapsed

params._validator: A validator to withdraw earnings and stakes.

cashOutEarnings(uint256).notice: Cash out the specified amount from cashable earnings        of a validator.

decreaseReputation(address,uint256).notice: Decreases reputation of a validator by delta.        Sets the validator's reputation to 0 if after operation        it's negative.

depositEarnings(address,uint256).notice: Deposits earnings of a validator by the specified amount.        Only fixed per-mille (`cashableEarningsPerMille`) from the        earned amount is cashable by a validator immediately.        The remaining is locked in the contract and can be cashed out        only when the validator has deregistered and cooling period        has elapsed.

increaseReputation(address,uint256).notice: Increases reputation of a validator by delta.

isSlashed(address).notice: Check if the validator address is slashed or not.

withdraw(address).notice: Withdraws staked and earnings values to a validator.
